title: Class of 2020
overview: Â What is it like to be a teenager? You have to face a lot of struggles, but those struggles prepare you for the best of your life. If you don't experience them, you won't grow! Watch the coming-of-age drama, which reveals how the students of De Nobili High School try to overcome the teenage problems, like confusions and perplexities, love and desires, and choices and dilemmas. These students untangle the tough threads. They make mistakes but from every mistake, they learn something new about life.
